ComicInfo.Summary: Resurgence [Part 4]: Having escaped from the Talarians, Captain Solano and crew of the Resolute attempt to make it back to Federation space using Leah Brahms' experimental warp drive, but they need to get the experimental drive up and running before the pursuing Talarians catch up to them.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-18 07:37:32. [CVDB972470] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 15:07:54. [Issue ID 2494652]
